Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. We're currently offering this remarkable product for $15000. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in making this investment. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer

You chose to make a counteroffer to Bob.

Send your counteroffer to Alice.
